Posts.Content: Oct 9, 2010 12:09AM luvlife wrote: I lost my hair 16 days after my first chemo treatment.  From that day I used a 3 step treatment called Nioxin.  I am 5 weeks post chemo and my hair is coming in thick, soft and very healty.  I rub some on my eyebrows too and they are growing already really nice.   My son is  balding at the age of 25, he started using Nioxin and much to my suprise his hair is getting thicker.  Not coming back but is getting thicker even with his military helmet on all the time. This may be an option if anyone wants to give it a try.  It is a little expensive but I am on week 16 with the same bottles as being bald and washing the scalp it goes a long way.  Does anyone have any ideas for the eye lashes?
